pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, August 30, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Mayor of Vancouver Kennedy Stewart.

Vancouver City Hall
453 West 12th Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:30 a.m.
